property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ True Escape (When this creature would leave, you may add 2 of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the "shield trigger" abilities of those shields.) ■ If you have no shields, this creature can't leave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost. If it's your opponent's turn, and you have had 2 or more of your shields broken this turn, this creature gets its Shield Trigger Plus ability.) {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS}: When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 3000 or less. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER} TWINPACT ■ Put the top card of your deck into your graveyard, then return an Abyss from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules2
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your graveyard, then return an Abyss from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this spell from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand or mana zone and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have a Dragon in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARDMAN} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature from your other creatures to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone for no cost, you may have that creature battle this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature or when this creature is discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of your opponent's creature, you may draw 4 cards.
